titles.title: Lawful Access to Encrypted Data Act
Lawful Access to Encrypted Data Act
Lawful Access to Encrypted Data Act
To improve the ability of law enforcement agencies to access encrypted data, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Intelligence (Permanent Select), and Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
